law.catch_line: This subtitle modifies, limits, and supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Comm...
law.text: This subtitle modifies, limits, and supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq., but does not modify, limit, or supersede § 101(c) of that act, 15 U.S.C. § 7001(c), or authorize electronic delivery of the notices described in § 103(b) of that act, 15 U.S.C. § 7003(b).
